bibl.title: An Order of Payment from the Apa Apollo Monastery at Bawit
bibl.seg: 141.13 / 141.4 P. Louisville Southeastern Baptist Theological Sem. Inv. C-542
David Wyman, An Order of Payment from the Apa Apollo Monastery at Bawit.

Edition of an eighth century order of payment from the Apa Apollo monastery at Bawit. The document is located at the Southern Baptist Theological Seminary (Louisville, Kentucky) and was donated to the seminary by Jerome M. Eisenberg in 1961.
bibl.note: Edition of an eighth century order of payment from the Apa Apollo monastery at Bawit. The document is located at the Southern Baptist Theological Seminary (Louisville, Kentucky) and was donated to the seminary by Jerome M. Eisenberg in 1961.
